name: Stellvia: Rising Wasteland (Canceled)
blurb: Pure, Unadulterated Combat mixed w/ Dark Humor (Comic Relief) and Satisfying, Non-Redundant Gameplay in a Post-Apocalyptic Setting.

rewards.reward:
MINION - Anyone who donates $5 or more will be invited to submit their ideas for encounters (be as creative, dark or fun as you'd like). Encounters are random events that the player runs into while traveling. All serious ideas will be considered (we don't care if it takes us days to go through emails), and the winners will receive a free copy of the game upon release.

This may not seem like enough to help out, but it actually is! There are hundreds, if not thousands of relevant models (characters, objects, buildings, post-apocalyptic scenery) that can be at least partially funded by this donation.

We can not thank all who take part in donating enough!

TRIBAL MUTANT - You will receive a full, digital copy of the game upon release, and receive access to the closed beta. We will also invite you to join the $5 tier in submitting encounter ideas (and possibly win another copy of the game to send to a friend if your idea is chosen).\r\n\r\nNote: Upon successful funding, the estimated release date for our project is Q4 2014.

RAIDER - This tier and higher ($45+) will be invited to Beta test a polished demo, months before the full release date (exact date not yet confirmed). You will receive a limited production physical printed DVD copy of the game (w/ artwork), AND a digital copy upon release! You will also receive 2 mini posters, decorated with Stellvia artwork (including our main female character, and one other at random) . This level backing can easily fund 4 1/2 - 9 minutes worth of voice acting (more or less, depending on the actor), as well as 3D models, animations, and scenery.\r\n\r\nYou will also be eligible to submit your encounter ideas to us via a designated email we will provide you (upon successful funding).

MOBSTER - These immensely generous backers will receive a limited production physical printed DVD copy of the game (w/ artwork), AND a digital copy upon release! Backers will be sent a Beta demo months before the scheduled full release date. You will also receive 5 mini posters, decorated with Stellvia artwork (including our main female character, along with various others). You'll also receive a corked vial of poison with a message inside (custom labeled, not actual poison) and an infinite amount of gratitude from the bottom of our hearts. Please don't drink the artificial poison; we want our backers to stay healthy (seriously).\r\n\r\nThe date shown below is regarding when you will receive your bonus gifts. The Beta demo, as well as the full release date are scheduled as Q4 2014 (the Beta being a few months before).

MOB BOSS - Defibrillator here! We are going to need one for this calibre of a donation. No, really. This type of donation will be used to further development to an unfathomable degree.

Backers will receive a limited production physical printed DVD copy of the game (w/ artwork), AND a digital copy upon release! You'll also receive 2 medium-sized, framed artworks. One framed poster will be of our lead female character. while the other will be comprised of various game content. We will also place your name through some sort of Easter Egg (e.g., John Freeman's French Toast Cereal). You will, of course, receive ALL previous tier rewards. Your name will be listed in the game credits, as well as on our website.

We will contact you personally (upon successful funding through your method of choice, then thank the hell out of you!). You will also be invited to have a Skype meeting with a member of our team. 

The date shown below is regarding when you will receive your bonus gifts. The Beta demo, as well as the full release date are scheduled as Q4 2014 (the Beta being a few months before).

MAD SCIENTIST - M-M-M-Mega Donation!

Upon successful funding, you will receive all previous tier rewards, including the Beta test demo, two special encounter demos (before Q3 2014), a limited production physical printed DVD copy of the game (w/ artwork), AND a digital copy upon release, as well as an invite to talk with us by phone, email and/or Skype as per your convenience. We will take at least 3 legitimate ideas that you come up with and immediately begin churning out/coding your ideas for the final product. If you are not satisfied with our full effort, then we will patch the game and improve upon what you imagined. Do you want your family in the game? No problem! Do you want to name a character after your girlfriend? Of course! How about naming a villain after your crazy ex? Want a liquor bottle (in game) to have your face on it? You've got it! How about making a character in the game have the same personality as someone you know? Check, and check. We will deliver. Guaranteed.

The date shown below is regarding when you will receive your bonus gifts. The Beta demo, as well as the full release date are scheduled as Q4 2014 (the Beta being a few months before).

THE GODFATHER - For this amount of project backing, we will do a favor for your family. Ok, maybe not that, but we WILL craft a small town or encounter comprised of anything that your heart desires.  We can discuss anything from characters, quests, dialogue, special/strange items as weapons, etc. Anything. There are very few exceptions at this level. We will bend time and space to make sure that you are satisfied with your purchase. Your name will be quite large in the credits and on our site. You will be able to contact one of us any time, any day. We will also make an Easter egg in your honor, which can either display your name, photo, or website. We will also make any photo of a friend/family member into a brand name object in the game.

You will receive a one-of-a-kind, deluxe edition copy of the game (as well as 5 digital copies upon release), and two one-of-a-kind T-Shirts created in your honor. You will also receive a thank you print-out, displaying a plethora of purchased content made possible by your amazing contribution.

The previous tier Beta encounter demos (Q3 2014), as well as all rewards, will also be mailed to you. You will be the first person who we mail rewards to. Our full 1.0 game release is estimated to be Q4 2014.
